name: GridDetailPanelApi
description: The master/detail API interface that is available in the grid apiRef.

properties.name: getExpandedRowIds
properties.description: Returns the rows whose detail panel is open.

properties.name: setExpandedRowIds
properties.description: Changes which rows to expand the detail panel.

properties.name: toggleDetailPanel
properties.description: Expands or collapses the detail panel of a row.
